short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Set prompt reminders from browser, notified by text messages

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The official RemindCMD extension

A browser extension that turns English prompts like "remind me tomorrow" into text message notifications—effortless and on time!
______________________________________________
# How RemindCMD Works

- 1/ Set reminder from desktop browser: Type "remindme" followed by an English prompt with fuzzy time directly in your browser address bar
- 2/ Get notified by text message: Never miss a beat with reliable, on-time text notifications straight to your phone!
______________________________________________
# Why Choose RemindCMD

- 1/ Convenience from your desktop browser: Quickly set a reminder while working on your desktop browser, no need to pick up your phone.
- 2/ Use fuzzy times like you speak: "tomorrow morning", "Monday next week", "at 5pm", etc. We understand them all.
- 3/ Get notified on the go: Reliably get notified anywhere and anytime via text messages, even after you shut down your desktop.
- 4/ High-prioritized notification: Text message notification has higher prioritization, so you won't miss an important event.
______________________________________________
# Key Features

- 1/ Set reminders from desktop browser: Type "remindme" followed by your reminder prompt in your browser address bar to set the reminder
- 2/ Use fuzzy time in plain English for the reminder prompt: Our smart parser can reliably parse "tomorrow morning", "Monday next week", "at 5pm", etc, so you don't have to know the exact date and time.
- 3/ Get notifications via text messages: You will receive a text message as we remind you for your events.
- 4/ Mobile-compatible web app: Our web app fits well on your mobile screen, so you can manage your reminders on the go.
______________________________________________
For more information, visit: https://www.remindcmd.com/
By installing the RemindCMD extension, you agree to RemindCMD’s Terms of Service (remindcmd.com/policies/terms) and Privacy Policy (remindcmd.com/policies/privacy).
